website_summaries.verdict: Gallon-sized supply of bed bug insecticide that kills resistant bed bugs and their eggs.
pros: Kills even toughest "pyrethroid resistant" bed bugs and eggs, best efficacy when sprayed directly on pests
EPA Registered as safe to use in homes and around children and pets
Provides up to 16 weeks of residual protection after treatment
cons: Effective, although may need re-treatment or use with other formulations to eliminate large infestations
Some purchasers had difficulties with included sprayer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson came to visit and left something to remember him by. BEDBUGS We tried so many products until I think the bugs waited for the new flavors. I was so frustrated !!!! I was ready to burn the house down and build a new one. I saw the reviews one dreary sleepless night and decided to try once more. I was not disappointed. This stuff works. I mean actually works. I recommend this to anyone who hasn't slept in months with their eyes open. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SOLUTION TO A BED BUG PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS CLEARLY THE VERY BEST, AS I HAVE TRIED MANY OTHERS THAT HAVE FAILED. THIS REALLY, REALLY WORKS. I HAD A BED BUG INFESTATION THAT WAS DRIVING ME NUTS AND TRIED MANY OTHER BRANDS OF BED BUG SOLUTIONS THAT SIMPLY KILLED ANY BUGS THAT WERE SPRAYED, BUT DID NOTHING RESIDUAL ."Harris Toughest Bed Bug Killer" WAS A BLESSING FOR ME THAT REALLY GOT RID OF MY INFESTATION., AND I THANK GOD AND THE HARRIS COMPANY FOR THAT.
customer_reviews.author: Keokikealii

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff works NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Been using another brand that was loosing effectiveness. This stuff has finished up where the other left off. The other brand did slow down, stopped and killed the bed bugs and was safe for pets. This stuff by Harris kills them NOW. I rechecked spots where eggs might be DEAD! I will continue to use this product until I can go 30 days without a bedbug. Then will still use it in a maintenance level for a year. I just have to be careful in my usage around my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E aka the Stitch 'n Frog

customer_reviews.title: After numerous other products and lots of frustration, I ...
customer_reviews.text: After numerous other products and lots of frustration, I finally found this product that did the trick. After 2 treatments, all bugs were dead. My advice is threefold: 1. get a mattress and box spring encasement 2. sprinkle diatomaceous earth powder around perimeter of bed and upholstered furniture until everything is clear 3. spray this Harris black label - carefully since you cannot allow it to touch any surface that comes in contact with skin Have patience - you can prevail!
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: The box comes with BIG BLACK PRINT for BED BUGS... so all of your neighbors can know!
customer_reviews.text: don't order if you want any privacy. The box comes with BIG BLACK PRINT for BED BUGS. Also HARRIS is printed all over the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was horrible the embarrassment of it alone was horrible add into ...
customer_reviews.text: i was dealing with bugs in my walls. it was horrible the embarrassment of it alone was horrible add into the fact my kids were sleeping on the floor in out living room so they weren't eaten alive I burnt our mattresses bought special laundry detergent and nothing killed them like this stuff I have not seen a live bug in the 3 weeks I have been using the spray! and this is after a 2 year infestation. ive torn everything apart spray it and then go back through and vaccum. I haven't even used half of the first bottle yet! it is a total godsend and saved my family <3
customer_reviews.author: charity owens

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR A FRIEND OF MINE THAT WAS BEING EATEN ALIVE WITH BED BUGS...SHE USED IT AND NOW SHE CAN SLEEP IN PEACE...ONE NEEDS TO KEEP ON THEM TO RID PERMANENTLY....VACUUM YOUR FLOOR TWICE A DAY AND LOOK FOR THOSE CRITTERS...THERE IS NO MAGIC BULLET BUT THIS STUFF WORKS....WAS GOING TO BUY FROM LOCAL BED BUG STORE BUT THE REVIEWS WERE TERRIBLE...CHOSE THIS AND GLAD WE DID....IF IT WORKED FOR HER IT SHOULD WORK FOR YOU...BOUGHT 2 GALLONS...AND THEN BOUGHT 2 GALLONS FOR SOMEONE ELSE THAT HEARD WHAT WAS GOING ON
customer_reviews.author: DoSomeMore

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed our entire room and adjacent rooms just to be sure. Now I am finding them on my wall and ceiling!!!!!! And they don't seem phased by it as the entire bed frame was spray and yet they are still getting onto the bed and not dieing. I have the interceptors on the feet. But apparently it's not killing the ones that may have been on the bed frame... Not very happy with this product and since a short return window...can't get a refund... At this point wasn't worth the almost 60 I spent.... Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: finklized

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a week and I still have bed bugs. I keep spraying it in every nook and cranny and they still seem to come out. I have used earth also and I still get them, yes I know I have to be proactive and I am with vacuuming everyday, washing my sheets ever other day using the spray and earth. I know it will take time and I refuse to call the bug man the cost is way too much, I'll just keep spraying, fogging and earthing until they go away or DIE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad we did because it is working just fine
customer_reviews.text: We were lucky that we caught the problem within days of when we think they came to our house. I used the whole galleon on beds, couches, base boards, you name it. Have had ZERO bites since it was applied and have not seen ANY bugs! THIS STUFF WORKS! I am buying another galleon next month to keep just in case whom we think the source was returns to our home. Being on a fixed and tight income, we could not afford to buy a product that would not work. I read the other reviews on this and seemed to be the one to go with. I am very glad we did because it is working just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm and the smell was NOT invasive as ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed bugs are gone after a couple of applications, if you ask anyone they say to just throw the infested material away once they get in there. But I had just purchased a mattress and couldn't afford to go out and get another one so I turned to Harris. Worked like a charm and the smell was NOT invasive as other Bed Bug Killers, that would have you up all night. It was an unfortunate accident that got them in there in the first place but harris got them out.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I Treated 8 days treat again, I am guessing that it is another hatchling group.  I did this 3 times.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product did not have a strong smell. No did it leave a spot or stain. I knew I had bugs because I had bites. I never saw a bug, but I think I saw remains Small white or black things . What does the actual bug look like? As you can see I have more questions than review. But I think the spray works, and I will continue to use it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with anything other than this specific brand
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing, and I do mean ONLY, that helped us rid our home of bedbugs when one of our children brought home a stuffed animal from school that came from an infested home. By the time we found out we had them, they were everywhere. It was truly a nightmare. We spent a ridiculous amount of money on dusting powders, bombs, and other products. One gallon of this took care of the problem. Don't waste your time with anything other than this specific brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Thank you God it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fix! I tried washing everything through out my rugs. Deep cleaned the room and bomed 2x and I could not get rid of the bed bugs. I finally found this on here read the reviews and saw the good comments. I got it did my room once and no more problems. I just followed the instructions and poof! All gone, this was great and easy to use. If your having bed bug trouble look no further this worked great!
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: have use this after having expensive pest control in last year. We still had some spotting here and there. Sprayed all over bedroom, mattress, under bed and carpet. Also sprinkled diamataceous earth under and around bed as well as on platform under mattress. the few survivors we've seen have been in a state of dehydration/dying with this combo.
customer_reviews.author: blaze

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for a month now, and have been really impressed with it! The first day we used it, we noticed an immediate difference in the amount of bugs we were seeing. After a month, I see one or two a day, compared to 10 to 12. We will continue to use this daily, until I see none a day. Along with this treatment, we have been vacuuming, washing the bedding, and have encased the mattresses. Harris can't work on it's own! You have to help be part of the solution with active care at home. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake bad container design
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this as part of a regimen to arrest the problem. Used about a third. Seems to help but you have to repeat. Just went back to get it... Weird bottle design i guess. Bottle was all sucked in and empty. All of the fluid had been sucked out and soaked into my carpet. Really disappointing as this one bottle is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer is the worst. Put into another bottle and used it that ...
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer is the worst. Put into another bottle and used it that way. In combination with the Harris Bed Bug Killer, Diatomaceous Earth Powder, no more bites. I didn't have a infestation. I had a couple bites, i knew the signs and started asap in treating. Thank God I think my effort worked and Thank God it wasn't a bad infestation. Also a good idea to spray the car. I think this might actually be where I got it from when i recently purchased a used vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: this product is a rip off
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed my couch twice to absolutely no effect whatsoever. I too the cushions off, sprayed them, sprayed under them until everything was saturated, sprayed in every crack until poison was running out and into the floor, turned the couch upside down and took the cloth of the bottom, sprayed the frame work, springs and padding until completely saturated and after both times I never found a dead bug but after dark I vacuumed multiple live bugs. I sprayed 2 bugs directly and when it dried they started to crawl off. I repeated tis 4 times with the same results.. I finally vacuumed them up, Harris should be shut down for false advertisement,
customer_reviews.author: disgusted customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as a contact killer.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as a contact killer whereas pyrethroid based products don't work at all. However, the residual effect seems to be minimal. Bed bugs pass back and forth through sprayed areas that have dried seemingly unaffected or undeterred, day after day with no reduction in numbers. The nests have to be found and sprayed directly to get rid of them. Otherwise, the only effective treatment is heat treatment, heating the entire room to 130F for a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: S. Noga

customer_reviews.title: THIS GOT RID OF MY BED BUGS PERMANENTLY!!
customer_reviews.text: LISTEN!!! My family and I moved to an apt that was filled with bed bugs. They called pest control and told us to get rid of EVERYTHING in the house and buy new ones (that’s how bad it is) but we couldn’t afford it. We ended up moving. Of course some of it moved with us then they had babies and my bed GOT FILLED with them to the point I had to keep buying beds cause no spray was working UNTIL I FOUND THIS! I still have some left (1+ year later) now I would probably see 1 bed bug every 3 months. The more you spray the less bed bug until they disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Kain

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I've ever come accross
customer_reviews.text: This works, I've had a severe problem with bed bugs and I bought four jugs of this and the bed bugs are gone, I tried several different things to get rid of the bed bugs and it was this product that finally worked. The reason for buying so many jugs was that the infestation was extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Smith

customer_reviews.title: The container it's sold in is *absolute garbage*.
customer_reviews.text: I was *severely* dissapointed in the sprayer nozzle that came with this. For the fifty dollars this bottle cost me I would have expected a half decent nozzle to apply it. It is utter garbage, flimsy as all heck and leaks like crazy. The leaking alone infuriated me so badly after 5 minutes of trying to get it to work correctly I dumped the bottle into pump sprayer and just used that... Does the chemical work? Probably... I'll update review if it doesn't. Otherwise assume it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas M.

customer_reviews.title: works but terrible sprayer
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work as described. However the sprayer on the product dispenser is terrible. I purchased 2 gallons and both sprayers failed to work after about a couple minutes. I have looked online and it seems to be a problem that has been reported several times and never fixed. Had to buy a sprayer to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The only product that works
customer_reviews.text: I trust this product because it's the only product that has shown me any results. The only issue I have with it is the nozzle doesn't always function properly. You have to fool with it a bit sometimes. Definitely try to straighten the tubing before use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fleas are no match for this product.
customer_reviews.text: Here in Texas, fleas are eating us alive this year. They're not satisfied with my dog and cat; they've started chewing on me. The usual flea sprays aren't making a dent. However, this spray is working! I thought fleas and bed bugs were similar. So, when all else fails, try something else. My pets wear flea collars, get flea drops, and flea medications. If fleas are driving you crazy, this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Capwell

customer_reviews.title: I am writing this review after two months of my purchase and I can happily say with lot of relief that it worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: Used many sparys for getting rid of bed bugs but nothing worked out.some might work for a month and after that the bugs just come from nowhere. This one just fixed my problem.It not only eliminates the bugs but also kills larvae as well resulting in a permanent solution.I am writing this review after two months of my purchase and I can happily say with lot of relief that it worked for me .Hence would recommend for others as well.
customer_reviews.author: dumb_for_sure

customer_reviews.title: Works,,!
customer_reviews.text: Works!! This product works with repeated use. I spayed bedding, floor, rugs, curtains , closets etc every three days. No problems with smell, stains,pets etc. However the EFFECTIVE range is about three days, then maintenance about once a week. One gallon will treat a house about eight times (average).I have no experience of use around infant children. Product is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: USNoldChief

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it might help but wouldnt get rid of the bed bug problem on my couch. I had never had bedbugs before so I wasnt sure what to use. I used this every day for about a week (along with vacuuming, shampooing, and steaming) and this stuff actually works. I soaked my couch in it. I havent seen a bed bug at all in over a week. I highly recommend this. It has a bad smell but the smell will fade away.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nichole Brooks

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, A BEDBUG KILLER THAT KILLS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERYTHING! My previous building had a bad bedbug infestation and that owner was an idiot so it was never resolved, moved somewhere else and gues who hitch hiked in the boxes? That's right these micro vampires. So after failing with countless other products I read the reviews on this and took a chance. THANK GOD I DID, THIS STUFF ACTUALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this product actually works because the sprayer barely puts out any liquid. I've tried every nozzle adjustment and jug angle to remedy this issue to no avail. If you're going to charge over $50 for this stuff you should at least make sure it can delivery the product. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RJS

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle is completely worthless unless you like getting drenched. The claim listed in description was that it continues to eliminate bed bugs long after it's sprayed. This didn't hold true for me. It does eventually kill live bugs after they are soaked, which to me means lay in bed until the bugs come, grab your sprayer, get soaked, run & get another squirt bottle, transfer the product, and hopefully get back before they have scattered. Terribly over priced as far as I'm concerned and doesn't work as claimed. Don't waste your money, there are better products to be found. Try a dry powder such as CimeXa. The bugs walk through it, it dehydrates them, and they die.
customer_reviews.author: amy smith

customer_reviews.title: It works but not for long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a small infestation exterminators wanted 1800 I said not going to happen. Now this product works but they come out after a couple weeks and start biting again. I got all the things this product recomended even the mattresses covers so Im going to say it did not work for me its a little to pricey for it not to work 100%
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: What was most important to me was the effect of the product . So far so good What most people dont realize if you have this type of problem it could take 2 maybe 3 application so dont get discouraged . Also I was Very Impressed with The On Time Delevary It made a Big differance in my produt choice ...
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Noble

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After many sleepless nights and trying many different products, i 100% vouche for this product. I bought the spray and the powder, did everything the instructions said and I have not been bit or even seen a live bed bug since I treated my room. YOU MUST VACUUM THE BED AND FRAME. Its the grossest but most crucial part. I even bought bed bug traps and moved my bed away from the wall for just in case factor. Since I paid 1000 for this mattress, I took another step and bought a mattress encasement as well. It sounds pricey but it sure beats paying the professionals to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Our son brought home some “friends” when he had to leave college during the COVID pandemic. I thought I’d have to burn my house down! This stuff was so amazing it was the only thing that worked without calling in a professional. Luckily we caught it early before we were completely infested. I hope to God I never need it again but if I ever do it’ll be my first choice! No smell and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie4

customer_reviews.title: Best money i ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: Followed all directions and procedures, this product 100% works. I have had family members and friends ask about how to get rid of Bed Bigs and i always refer the. To this exact product. This was back in 2016 when i bought this product and i havent seen or had any other issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Brokaw

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This worked! We spent 6 months battling bugs in a 3 bedroom house with 4 kids. We tried the earth powder, eco sprays, Walmart bug sprays, mattress covers, everything! Within days of spraying mattresses, baseboards, door frames, and furniture they were gone! AFTER MONTHS THEY WERE GONE WITHIN DAYS!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Franken

customer_reviews.title: Harris Toughest Bed Bug Killer works just as they say it does
customer_reviews.text: Harris Toughest Bed Bug Killer, Liquid Spray with Odorless and Non-Staining Extended Residual Kill Formula (Gallon): Great product, works immediately.And it is what the company says it is. I just noticed that I had bed bugs, and I think I got them from the last trip to my home state. But this stuff works like a charm. I'd recommend it to everyone, especially those family members that aren't living so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Highly dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. The container leaked and ruined several books on my bookshelf. Lost probably half of the container. Sprayer was not efficient. Product didn’t yield satisfactory results. Couldn’t believe how much I paid. Sure you can return but the container was not useable. Had to transfer to other containers. More success with products bought locally. Should not have ordered this. Useless. Back to the old reliable product night at Lowe’s. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: B Batman

customer_reviews.title: Buy it once, buy it right. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: After months of trying cheaper pesticide and diatamaceous earth, that we thought was working, warm weather brought a "bloom" of nasty blood suckers! It was time to get serious. I know this is not cheap, but it's the only thing that works. Highly recommend this. No issues with a spray nozzle, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: lisa sanders

customer_reviews.title: never received
customer_reviews.text: Harris is the top brand for fighting bedbugs, but bedbugs don't know that and some are totally resistant to Harris. Such is my case. I never got this, so I am not sure if I cancelled it or it was another stolen delivery from my front porch, but I know that Harris is considered one of the non-pro best.
customer_reviews.author: Branson Mom living in Chillicothe

customer_reviews.title: Leaks if you do not screw cap completely closed
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well. However, if you do not completely screw the cap of the sprayer completely closed it will continue to pour out and leave a large puddle of liquid where ever you set it down. Every time I sat the product down to move something out of the way so I could continue to spray, I had to close the top of the sprayer and it made it very frustrating and time consuming! It also is NOT odorless. We had to actually keep out of the room a whole day because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Stull

customer_reviews.title: Used to have tiny, nearly invisible bedbugs...now the are the size of a pencil lead.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff appears to be a great fertilizer for bed bugs...I have MORE and BIGGER BUGS. I am so very disappointed with this product and with my infestation.
customer_reviews.author: rakooi

customer_reviews.title: This will work!
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastically for resistant bedbugs! And when we had a problem with our order the company was quick and fair in handling it. Very happy with our purchase. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Updated Bugs at bay
customer_reviews.text: Have used this spray 3x @7-10 day intervals on couch and wicker chair a hallway and room away from original infested bedroom, just found a large dead bug on a doormat. It is working! Appreciate the anonymous support group on Amazon for getting through this nightmare. Will continue spraying until I see no dead 💀bug bodies.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. The best!
customer_reviews.text: You willl see the results the very first time you use it. Try to apply it once per week and by a month all the bastards will be gone. I tried so many different products, services, treatments, and traps. Nothing worked better than this elixer of life and peacefulness. It is easier to put some liquid in another spray bottle and use it with better mobility and ease. I would reccomend this. My infestation case was not huge, but it was getting out of control. Two years trying different things. And now, i can sleep and rest without problems and the paranoia is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Hector gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly effective
customer_reviews.text: Chemicals are harmful to your environment. This product is somewhat effective but overall doesn't eliminate bed bugs. You have to maintain control every 6 to 8 weeks. Bed bugs are resilient and over time they will resist this product. Only way to effectively control them is freezing them with either CO2 or other products not available to consumers. So you would have to hire someone with a license. This product is good for a while but they will end up resisting.
customer_reviews.author: MagicCamera

customer_reviews.title: Wicked bad smelling
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate it according to its' efficacy but I will attest to the fact that it stinks like the worst ever locker room with weeks old sweaty socks, underwear, bras and jock straps rotting stench ever. It has been about a week since it was sprayed in one bedroom on the second floor and my front entry way, on the first floor still has that wreaking stench going on. The yellow one did not have this lingering odor. Anyways, gave up and have an exterminator coming because this is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: luckyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I had a few (not many) bedbugs. While I hired a professional bedbug exterminator to come spray, I purchased this as a backup spray. Bedbug problem successfully eliminated. Unlike the spray used by the exterminator, this spray doesn’t require a gas mask, nor do you have to evacuate the premises for several hours after spraying. Just be careful to remove the spray nozzle after use so the bottle doesn’t leak. The product is thick, so we found it is easier to use if we pour it into a smaller spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Judith J. McNally

customer_reviews.title: Odorless Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the number one feature for me. Also safe for pets. I've only had this for a couple of days. So it is difficult to evaluate the effectiveness. The only issue I have is that we cannot get the sprayer to mist. The product comes out in a stream. We just poured some into a separate bottle and have used that effectively. I cannot adequately address the value for the money since we have only had this for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Qltn_gma

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when u put spray top on..fluid will all leak out .however..this works better than anything I've tried..dont waste your money on anything else..this and some glue traps ..you should be ok..and yes I have had my apt heat treated..since last summer..when it gets hot a new egg hatches..these are the hardest things to get rid of..i never ever heard of them before last year..the bug was in a mattress set i purchased..so i treat my apt..i buy mattress bed bug covers for the new mattresses and this black harris bed bug treatment seems to kill existing eggs..I really really like this spray..this line is kind of pricey tho..but it's really worth it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie bess

customer_reviews.title: It’s like murder town for creepy crawlers.
customer_reviews.text: Give all those little F-ers the finger. Watch them die. Works great. Super satisfied with how effective this stuff work on killing bed bugs That being said. Buy 2 bottles. Treat the first time. Then 10 days later spray those little bastards again for cheap insurance. 🤘
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Not too effective
customer_reviews.text: Chemically, not effective when sprayed directly on bugs, doesn't seem to have too much lasting effect either. Used the herbal one that is popular and took care of them right away.
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent killer of the worst creature on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders on the bugs. Really impressed. There is an immediate difference. I haven’t seen one since I sprayed this. I will add another coating in a week. However, the nozzle and spray need work. It would stop spraying in the middle of nowhere. I had to open it and take the nozzle out and put it back in for it to work again. Plus the spray needs more levels. It’s either too much or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great for bugs, sprayer nozzle literally sucks.
customer_reviews.text: If you leave the sprayer nozzle lower than bottle top the sprayer will leak and siphon entire gallon onto carpet. Make sure you seal spray/stream closed. Worked so well on bugs (the little I used) even after 3/4 gal soaked floor overnight I bought a second one and keep nozzle above bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Den L

customer_reviews.title: It Just Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with these evil, demonic critters and nothing would kill them. They kept on coming, even after you think they are gone for good. However, they are now actually gone for good thanks to Harris Toughest Bed Bug Killer! I've used this to do the initial treatment, and sprayed just about everything. I then followed up with maintenance spraying every weekend after the first treatment for about 6 weeks. I am now free of the bed bug plague! Buy with confidence and get your life back!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Went 4 stars because it took a lot longer to ventilate the rooms after treatment than expected and because the sprayer nozzle didn't quite work as well as we had hoped. Product seemed effective, but be prepared to retreat every two weeks for a couple of months. Love how it comes in bulk so you can treat larger or more area than the cans/bombs. Seems more effective than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rayndiel

customer_reviews.title: Our buggies were immune.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for our bugs. Many of the bedbugs out there are immune to these insecticides. Save the money and invest in a professional.
customer_reviews.author: DNA Diva

customer_reviews.title: It freaking works
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you guys.... I was skeptical at first about this product I didn't think It would work honestly but i took a day where i washed and dried my bedding for about 40 mins high heat but before that I actually sprayed around my bed and and tha walls near even the cracks where I witnessed thee dreaded creatures were coming out of and I'm a bout a few weeks in and nothing nada zip has touched me even those resistant ones died (knock on wood) thank you Harris for this great freaking product
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: kills on contact
customer_reviews.text: liked the spray although after reading other reviews was very careful to keep sprayer head above bottle when not in use so it did not siphon out. bought the powder too. Although the room is empty we had to get rid off everything. We have not seen any bugs. Plan to redo spraying in a week. Then move new bed in. will let you know in a few months how its going but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVIOUR !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is real magic! A life saviour! Believe me! I've tried so many bed bug killers and nothing helped until I tried this. Some sprays and powders helped for a few weeks but then bugs would return! I tried all possible remedies. So many tips on YouTube. All in vain! I sprayed this one time! Long time ago! I am so happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Kennedy (Pachabutava)

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We used this 4 years ago, we've been bed bug free sense, the infestation was mainly in our recliner, which my husband used, he is not allergic to the bite so he didn't realize they were there. He was very diligent in spraying over and under, we did our recliner, sofa, and bed (just in case) and haven't seen any sense. We have no idea how it started. GOOD PRODUCT, THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Mary Herrera

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that provided relief.
customer_reviews.text: As they are now referred to as “BB”s, they are relentless and provide no chance of happiness for YEARS. Other sprays seemed to deter for weeks or months at a time, but they’d come back with a vengeance. I was informed of this product, knew I needed the largest possible size, and caved. Worth the money. Would recommend one for a standard room, especially if there is carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, so far no sign of bugs after only one spray. Was plenty to do entire house and have 1/3 bottle left over for a second pass in a couple weeks. Finally feel at ease that problem has been contained and potentially eradicated!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Harrison keeps them away longer, and doesn't smell.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before, and I like it way better then Proof. I live in an old farm house with 9 other people, two are my Land Lords and I got a big chewing out because other people said they got sick because of the smell of that Proof and that smell doesn't kill anything) like a spray bomb dose. this time I bought Harrison bed bug powder too.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Gaige

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother with anything else - spend the money and get this product! You’ll be wasting your money with anything else. Sadly, these days the odds are increasing of falling victim to cross contamination with these nasty bugs, especially if you travel, even the nicest of resorts and hotels. We were unfortunate enough to become victims of this. One hit with this took care of it. We hit it again a month later just to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I use
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have found that really kills bed bugs dead. I bought the gallon so that I can hose everything down once a week, until I don't see them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Witchy Kid

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BUGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE Harris Bed Bug Killer. It really works. I tried everything I could to get rid of the bed bugs in my apartment. A friend told me about Harris. I love this product. It really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works great sprayed every three days carpet
customer_reviews.text: Works great sprayed every three days carpet, all bed cracks, mattress, box spring.Two bedrooms Were mildly infected.Only 2 bugs found in third bedroom but sprayed all three room for about three weeks. Outside bedroom door frame for those who wanted to travel. Washed and dry all that's affected. Also used the powder along the base board of walls and bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't wast your money on nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a little of every thing. This is clearly what it takes after they been exposed to orther stuff and survive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked!
customer_reviews.text: We were losing our minds trying to deal with an infestation at our elderly aunt's apartment......suffice it to say that this product really works! Suggest you do a multi-attack approach. Read up on recommended steps and use this last. Go back and respray a week to 10 days later to get new hatched out bed bugs. You will probably need to discard the upholstered furniture and old mattress if involved.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Bed bug spray
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I think it's working. I sprayed numerous times. The only issue is that the nozzle kept clogging up. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I found a nest at a place I soaked with this thing a week before. I sprayed the whole room all over and still there were bed bugs coming out after that. It's definitely not worth the money. There are cheaper products that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: VIY

customer_reviews.title: This and a bunch of DE spread in places i ...
customer_reviews.text: This and a bunch of DE spread in places i can't otherwise reach has taken an epidemic 'oh gods make it stop' level infestation to near zero in just a couple of days. Only complaint is the spray nozzle has a hole in the middle of the spray pattern
customer_reviews.author: Wyldside

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy, lost a huge amount of product
customer_reviews.text: Wasted money on this and lost more than half of the product because it leaked all over my floor. The nozzle is crap!! I can’t even say this product works because like I said, I lost so much product I can’t even use it for another treatment. Nearly $60 spent to treat a couch and one room. Very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garay

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake bad container design
customer_reviews.text: Lost all liquid BAD sprayer!! I can't tell you how it worked i don't have a drop left
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the great reviews. It didn.t work for me. I sprayed two dyas in a row, waited three days then sprayed again. No effect on the bed bugs.I bought the diatomaceous earth and that worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Granite

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the harris powder it worked great. Took several months which is normal as bed bugs are insidious creatures. I still keep it on hand "just in case" since I live in an apartment and the bugs can travel if a neighbor gets them; however, I have not seen a bed bug in over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Woods

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ASAP
customer_reviews.text: I carried a couple if bed bugs home, and in a blind panic, bought this early in the morning as soon as I discovered bug bites on my legs. Im very happy I did! If you think you have bed bugs purchase this right away, wash and dry your sheets and clothes on HOT, and try to keep it contained in one room. Worth the price! Use this instead of bombs.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because I haven’t tested its effectiveness yet. But it arrived leaking everywhere in the box. I’m not returning it since most of it is still in the container as It is still sealed. So I’m not sure where the leak is coming from. It is very frustrating to open up the box and instantly have your hands soaked with pesticide though. I will update this review after I spray my house down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Product has low odor, great coverage, and an excellent sprayer. Only reason I took off a star is that the bedbugs died quickly and efficiently, leaving no bodies to inspect. The only proof we had of their existence were the bites which ceased after spraying.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowGodOfWar

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor went on a cruise and a few weeks later found bed bugs. They called the exterminator and the list YOU have to do before they spray is enormous. They noticed the bugs on a weekend and bought their first bottle local and the rest from Amazon. It worked great plus they saved a $1000.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Package came damaged ! Didn't receive full bottle
customer_reviews.text: When I got it the bottle was damaged & some had leaked out . Actually a lot had but, what I did use did seem to help . Sure wish I would of a got the experience with a new bottle that wasn't damaged bc I'm sure this product does as said . I can't say honestly it did bc I didn't receive the full bottle but, what I did get to use did seem to help . Saw less in my bedroom where I used what I received. Only reason I didn't give a 5 star is bc it came damaged & I didn't get to try product to full capacity. Thank you have a great day !
customer_reviews.author: Nicenecie

customer_reviews.title: I moved into this place that have bed bugs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I moved into this place that have bed bugs...This product absolutely works. Guys bearing in mind due diligence is required if you have bed bugs...But it WORKS!!! I had gotten the powder first and let it sit for 3 weeks, Used a mattress encasement and washed sheets and pillow cases every 2-3 days and and after 2 bottles over 3-4 month process. I am all clear of those critters...Thank God!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Schoolar

customer_reviews.title: Good to have and use
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Harris bed bug spray for several years. Love the way it works. So when I needed to reorder I thought I would use this version. Only used it once. Haven't seen any hint of the little devils', but spraying every few weeks gives me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J. Kuessel

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: this stuff kills them dead in their tracks, just make sure to follow instructions
customer_reviews.author: THXkid

customer_reviews.title: Arm yourself with this!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this thing works. Ended up getting two gallons of this, used up all of them. It was an annoying, long, and difficult process going to war with these darn pests, but after 6+ months they have lost. My advice is keep spraying routinely as directed and they will go away. It just takes a while, of course depending of your situation.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Had a stubborn problem tried many products with no results. I did have to spray this product a few times but in the end they are all gone. Finally gone. Highly recommend for stubborn infestations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and had used Harris reg bug spray and it worked better and was cheaper than exterminator , so I already knew the tougher had to be great gave to daughter and she was very pleased it removed bugs in no time and she didn't have to get rid of furniture. Which is a savings within itself, I myself always keep some on hand That way if they venture in my home they won't live long w/clothing wash according to label directions then dry on highest temp.furniture spray and let dry not harmful to animals . Then get a goodnites. Sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: This is the second Harris product I bought with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Harris product I bought with a spray nozzle to be used with a gallon product. Both did not work. We sprayed our house and still have bed bugs showing up. Followed directions but these little buggers keep on coming. I guess we will have to fork over three grand for a professional exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome product, I had done everything from spending money on having exterminators that didn’t work. I even bought other products it was not until I used this product that they finally disappeared. It has been a year now and no problems still
customer_reviews.author: R. Cowley

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer wasn't screwed all the way shut so it ...
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer wasn't screwed all the way shut so it started dispensing product while still in the package sitting on my chair. I mean, yes, this chair will never get bedbugs. But in a house with children I really think it was unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Rezin Secrest

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: Had an infestation in my couch and bed bugs crawling all over walls. Ordered a gallon jug and treated 3 times the first week and saw a dramatic reduction. Have treated couch once a week and bugs are all but gone. It is practically impossible to get rid of a bedbug infestation but this stuff will do it. Dont waste your money on anything else.. A word of caution - Do not leave spray hose in jug, or entire contents will leak out overnight! Remove it after ever use and jug will last for months. Remember to treat once a week to keep bugs from coming back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time now that I have bought this product and it does the job well. I had used this once on my room and recently found the little trouble makers moved to my sister's rooms. This has been my DIY go to versus an expensive exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: T.Preston

customer_reviews.title: this is best there is for destroying the bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: i should have written this sooner, but this product and few others the company makes, are true to their word.
customer_reviews.author: goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Finally this one works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had bedbugs for, good grief, two years. I got them from the yoga mats at the gym. I have since left that gym and bought my own yoga mat. I tried quite a few solutions to get rid of the bedbugs and this time I washed my encasements, sprayed down the bed frame and into the cracks where the baseboard meets the floor behind the headboard, behind the headboard and picture,and I steamed the wooden floor. It has been 6 weeks and I haven't seen a single bedbug or any blood stains on the sheets. I think we have a winner here!
customer_reviews.author: Debora k.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy 3 times but it did work... took about 3 months to kill them all. I guess because of the eggs
customer_reviews.author: VCarter

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about 3 weeks and noticed that the first week it looked as if it had worked in eliminating the bedbugs. But as week 2 came, the bites were back. By week 3, it had no effect and we were forced to go with Western Pest Services (3 treatments). I was under the impression it would be a bedbug killer but I guess it's a temporary repellent at best.
customer_reviews.author: Danny N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.  A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product after reading the reviews. Mom picked up bedbugs from a daycare center. Before we knew it, the bugs had multiplied and we felt out of control. Called in a professional, paid him big bucks and he came multiple times to kill them. Decided 2 weeks ago to purchase this product as a future treatment to avoid paying the professionals in case we see bedbugs again. This is excellent stuff. It kills fast and they don't come back. Would highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: CRW

product_meta.title: HARRIS Bed Bug Killer, Toughest Liquid Spray with Odorless and Non-Staining Extended Residual Kill Formula (Gallon)
feature_bullets: Kills Resistant Bed Bugs & Their Eggs - Kills even the toughest "pyrethroid resistant" bed bugs and eggs that have built up a resistance to traditional pesticides
Kills Quickly - Knocks down bed bugs fast when sprayed directly
EPA Registered - Approved for use in homes with people and pets by the Environmental Protection Agency (No. 1021-2597-3). Always follow label directions
Long Residual - Continues to kill bed bugs for up to 16 weeks after initial application
Odorless Formula - Odorless and non-staining formula will not cause damage to fabrics when used according to label directions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,778 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
